body.name: VIZIO 50-inch MQX-Series 4K 120Hz QLED HDR10+ Smart TV with Dolby Vision, Active Full Array, 240Hz @ 1080p PC Gaming, WiFi 6E, Apple AirPlay, Chromecast Built-in, M50QXM-K01, 2023 Model
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by GlobalRenewedNetwork.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 45 mins
features: Max 4K Picture Perfection - Stream or game in over 1 billion colors enhanced with Quantum Color QLED. Deep contrast and high peak brightness are achieved with the Active Full Array Backlight + local dimming, enhanced with Dolby Vision HDR Bright Mode & HDR10+, and fine-tuned with Active Pixel Tuning.

America’s Smart TV - Instantly access millions of titles with America's Smart TV. Stream shows, movies, news, sports, music, and more on all your favorite apps, and enjoy over 250 free channels on WatchFree+.

Free TV Lives Here - Save on cable bills and stream for free with VIZIO WatchFree+. Built-in to every new VIZIO TV, WatchFree+ gives you 260+ live streaming channels and over 6,000 titles on demand. No subscriptions, logins, or fees.

Ultimate Gaming TV - Truly built for gamers. Game in 4K at 120 fps or 1080p at 240 fps on PC. AMD FreeSync Premium, VRR, ultra-low input lag, HDMI 2.1, Dolby Vision, and the integrated gaming menu power on with Auto Game Mode when a console or PC is detected.

The Future of Connectivity - Stream in the fast lane with WiFi 6E. Double the bandwidth of 5G, 6GHz acts as a superhighway, allowing you to stream more content without interrupting other connected devices in your Smart Home. That's ideal 4K streaming.
body.description: Experience the extraordinary. Celebrate VIZIO’s 20th Anniversary with the NEW VIZIO M-Series Quantum X 4K HDR Smart TV. Step up to immersive Active Full Array LED streaming and gaming with 1 billion+ colors of picture perfection, all wrapped in VIZIO’s ThinFrame Design. America’s Smart TV gives you millions of movies, shows, sports, news, free channels, and more in seconds.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Max 4K Picture Perfection. Stream or game in over 1 billion colors enhanced with Quantum Color QLED. Deep contrast and high peak brightness are achieved with the Active Full Array Backlight + local dimming, enhanced with Dolby Vision HDR Bright Mode & HDR10+, and fine-tuned with Active Pixel Tuning.
Ultra-low input lag and AMD FreeSync Premium give you zero tearing and stutter-free gaming. The 50" M-Series Quantum X took home the CES Innovation award for 240Hz gaming in Full HD.

America's Smart TV Stream it all. Access your favorite apps, cast from your phone, or watch hundreds of free channels. Free TV lives here. No fees, logins or subscriptions required. Hundreds of curated free channels and thousands of on demand titles. We work with everyone. Use Alexa, Google Home, and Apple Home for voice control and smart home integration. Stream from your device. Stream it all and more or mirror your screen for presentations and video chats directly on your VIZIO Smart TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VIZIO MQX-Series: A Vibrant and Versatile 4K TV for Gamers and Creators
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Amazing picture quality with vibrant and realistic colors thanks to the Quantum Color technology and the full array local dimmingSupports Dolby Vision and HDR10+ formats for enhanced contrast and brightnessGreat TV for gaming on PC or console with one HDMI 2.1 port that can handle 4K at 120Hz with low input lag and AMD FreeSync Premium for smooth gameplayCan do 1080p at 240Hz, which is perfect for fast-paced games like Call of Duty and Counter-StrikeEasy to use SmartCast platform with plenty of apps and free channels to streamGreat sound quality, especially when connected to a home theater systemMakes PC gaming and music creation more immersive and enjoyableCons:Only one HDMI 2.1 port with 4K/120Hz supportHeavy and bulky on the wallLimited brightness compared to other TVs in this price rangeMiddling audio quality without a sound systemDoesn’t let you add apps from the Play Store, but this is not a problem for me since I have a PCI’m very happy with my purchase of the VIZIO 50-inch MQX-Series 4K 120Hz QLED HDR10+ Smart TV. It has amazing picture quality with vibrant and realistic colors thanks to the Quantum Color technology and the full array local dimming. It also supports Dolby Vision and HDR10+ formats for enhanced contrast and brightness. The best part is that it’s a great TV for gaming on PC or console. It has one HDMI 2.1 port that can handle 4K at 120Hz with low input lag and AMD FreeSync Premium for smooth gameplay. It can even do 1080p at 240Hz, which is perfect for fast-paced games like Call of Duty and Counter-Strike. The SmartCast platform is easy to use and has plenty of apps and free channels to stream. I also love the sound quality of this TV, especially when I connect it to my home theater system. It makes PC gaming and music creation more immersive and enjoyable. I highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a budget-friendly but high-performance 4K TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Vizio comes with the ability to add APPs to it from their store. Vizio has a huge selection of pre-installed APPs and a great Free selection. I find I watch Vizio now more than I watch the cable companies selection. I think I'm going to drop most or all of my cable.It was really easy to set up. It already had all the APPs I use already installed. I only needed to log in to access them. Be sure to have all your log in information to speed things up. You'll also need to know your WiFi information too. I accessed 6 APPs and my cable subscription, and to set all my preferences in less than 30 minutes.I've owned Vizio TV's for over 10 years and never had a problem till the one before this. All I had to do was contact Vizio customer support and give them the information about the problems I was having and they issued a refund. I had that set for over 2 yrs and they gave me almost enough to buy the new set which is a big rise in picture quality. The colors are vibrant and you have the ability to choose the calibration of brightness. This TV is for my bedroom and they even have a choice of brightness for dark rooms such as a bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've just spent a few days getting my Vizio "Fire TV" to work with all my devices. The VQP65C-84 has a great picture and decent sound but there is nothing about it that suggests Fire TV. If you want to use a Fire TV Recast, be prepared to connect devices such as Fire TV Stick or Fire TV Cube. The TV itself can not be directly connected to an Amazon account as those devices are and Fire TV Recast will not work without them.I called Vizio customer service for help but was told to set up my devices the way I did with my previous non-Fire TV smart TV. Therefore, I'm not sure why they call it Fire TV or even IF they should. Maybe it is because they have a lot of streaming apps preloaded onto the TV. But, according to Wikipedia, that's not what Fire TV is.So now, I have two home pages, one for Vizio and one for Amazon. Otherwise, it is, so far, a very good "smart TV."Oh by the way, I had to turn down the brightness and color adjustments slightly. The picture was too bright and the color was over saturated. But those are just adjustments in settings. Looks great on Vizio and Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great TV. Bought it to replace a Sony TV the kids broke that was 5yrs old. Vizio TV remote works with the PS5. Picture quality is excellent and audio is good..I use a sound bar that has 3D Audio. Highly recommend this TV for gaming. It's hard to beat the performance for price and 120Hz 4K VRR.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Delivery was great, 1st off! I had been leary, needlessly, buying a tv through Amazon. And a Vizio to boot! Since I've been a Samsung guy for years. What a fantastic picture! And on my Ps5. too! Just make sure you have it on game mode when playing. And, I literally sit amazed looking at the picture I see watching network tv, too. BEAUTIFUL! I still haven't even watched 4k video yet. And the price was very reasonable! No regrets! Gotta go! Time for MW3!
